fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article that listed the Englishmen to have managed Champions League clubs since 1992 omitted Leeds United’s Howard Wilkinson (Homegrown bosses need chances, says Lampard, 28 October, page 39). • A feature on the future of golf courses discussed Brighton and Hove’s Hollingbury site, and mistakenly said that “Liberal Democrat councillors pushed for the space to be used for affordable housing”. We meant to refer to the city’s Lib Dems, not councillors (Are there too many golf courses?, 26 October, page 4, G2). • Other recently amended articles include: Anger spreads in Islamic world after Macron’s backing for Muhammad cartoons James Randi obituary Crossrail 2 plans shelved as part of £1.8bn TfL funding deal New Zealanders coming home for Christmas warned isolation hotels may be full The media has mostly not taken the bait on dubious Biden claims – with some Australia-linked exceptions
